com.betterit.kaligia.controller

Class CameraController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.betterit.kaligia.controller.CameraController

  • @RestController
public class CameraController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller for working with Camera Control JAR. It handles calls made for controlling the USB Endoscope Camera via the JAR.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CameraController()

    • Method Detail

      • runSkinCapture

        @RequestMapping(value="/skinCapture",
                method=GET)
public SkinCapture runSkinCapture(@RequestParam(value="orderNo",defaultValue="Dummy1")
                                                                                                      java.lang.String orderNo)
                                                                                               throws java.io.IOException,
                                                                                                      java.lang.InterruptedException,
                                                                                                      java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                                                                                                      javax.naming.CannotProceedException
        Calls Camera Control JAR, which captures an image using the USB connected Endoscope, and creates a SkinCapture object.

        Once Camera Control JAR has saved the SkinCapture object, this function will de-serialize the object and calculate calibrated luminosity.

        Parameters:
        orderNo - order for which skin measurement would be taken.
        A dummy value 'Dummy1' is passed as a default for testing
        Returns:
        SkinCapture object with calibrated luminosity
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an I/O error occurs
        java.lang.InterruptedException
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - Class of a serialized object cannot be found
        javax.naming.CannotProceedException - Error in capturing skin measurement

      • calibrateCameraCapture

        @RequestMapping(value="/calibrateCameraCapture",
                method=POST)
public java.lang.String calibrateCameraCapture(@RequestParam(value="colorFlag")
                                                                                                                               java.lang.String colorFlag)
                                                                                                                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Calls Camera Control JAR, which captures an image using the USB connected Endoscope, and creates a SkinCapture object.
        Parameters:
        colorFlag - "bright" or "dark" to differentiate between high luminosity standard material and low luminosity standard material.
        The saved object is saved with the name as colorFlag
        Returns:
        String with path of saved SkinCapture object
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • calibrateCameraSave

        @RequestMapping(value="/calibrateCameraSave",
                method=POST)
public boolean calibrateCameraSave(@RequestParam(value="brightColorObjPath")
                                                                                                                java.lang.String brightColorObjPath,
                                                                                                                @RequestParam(value="darkColorObjPath")
                                                                                                                java.lang.String darkColorObjPath,
                                                                                                                javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
                                                                                                         throws java.lang.Exception
        Saves Camera Calibration by getting RGB values of Bright and Dark Standard Luminosity materials' SkinCapture object
        Parameters:
        brightColorObjPath - Path to bright standard luminosity material's SkinCapture object
        darkColorObjPath - Path to dark standard luminosity material's SkinCapture object
        request - HttpServletRequest object
        Returns:
        boolean Returns true if code runs successfully
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
